h1.span: Coronavirus - Links for Parents and Students

div.h3: Below are links with current and accurate information about the Coronavirus (COVID-19). Several of the links can assist you with discussing/sharing information about COVID-19 with your child:

h3.a: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) - Official Coronavirus Information Site
Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) - Talking with children about Coronavirus Disease 2019
PA Department of Health - Coronavirus updates and information in Pennsylvania
BrainPop video - Informational video about the coronavirus for K-6 grade students
National Association of School Psychologists (NASP) - Talking to Children about COVID-19 (Coronavirus): A Parent Resource
Kidsburgh.org - Are your kids anxious about Cornoavirus? Dr. G. is here to help
British Broadcasting Corporation (BBC) News - Coronavirus: Keep it simple, stick to facts - how parents should tell kids
For Kids - Handwashing information and Coloring sheets (download)
Digital Promise - Digital Resources and recommendations for families to help kids learn outside the classroom
American Academy of Pediatrics - healthychildren.org - 2019 Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19)
